lead_paragraph: Cricket Australia has bolstered its campaign to host a day-night test against South Africa later this year by publishing an interview with captain Steve Smith in which he backed the proposed fixture.

headline.print_headline: Smith Backs Cricket Australia Campaign for Day-Night Test
headline.main: Smith Backs Cricket Australia Campaign for Day-Night Test

snippet: Cricket Australia has bolstered its campaign to host a day-night test against South Africa later this year by publishing an interview with captain Steve Smith in which he backed the proposed fixture....
